channel.title: Cache will not download from link

item.title: Cache will not download from link
item.dc:creator: @mage_pwns mage pwns
item.description:
@mage_pwns wrote:

when i try to run the client without manually putting the cache in the C:/ drive i get this:

2LQdV.png783Ã—546

signlink.java:

	public static String findcachedir() {
		return "C:/MythScape/";
	}
	public static String sencondDir() {
		final File file = new File("C:/MythScape/");
		if (!file.exists()) {
			file.mkdir();
		}
		return file.toString();
	}

CacheDownloading.java:

        private String cacheLink = "http://www.fileden.com/files/2012/3/2/3273076/MythScape.zip"; // Link to cache

client.java:

	@Override
	void startUp() {
		// main();
		// models();
		drawLoadingText(20, "Starting up");
		new CacheDownloader(this).downloadCache();
		setNewMaps();
		if (signlink.sunjava) {
			super.minDelay = 5;
		}

help please?
